JavaFX 16

Uses of Class
javafx.scene.control.TableView.ResizeFeatures

Packages that use TableView.ResizeFeatures
Package Description
javafx.scene.control
The JavaFX User Interface Controls (UI Controls or just Controls) are specialized Nodes in the JavaFX Scenegraph especially suited for reuse in many different application contexts.

  • Uses of TableView.ResizeFeatures in javafx.scene.control

    Fields in javafx.scene.control with type parameters of type TableView.ResizeFeatures
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Callback<TableView.ResizeFeatures,​Boolean> TableView.CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY
    Simple policy that ensures the width of all visible leaf columns in this table sum up to equal the width of the table itself.
    static Callback<TableView.ResizeFeatures,​Boolean> TableView.UNCONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY
    Very simple resize policy that just resizes the specified column by the provided delta and shifts all other columns (to the right of the given column) further to the right (when the delta is positive) or to the left (when the delta is negative).
    Methods in javafx.scene.control that return types with arguments of type TableView.ResizeFeatures
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ObjectProperty<Callback<TableView.ResizeFeatures,​Boolean>> TableView.columnResizePolicyProperty()
    Called when the user completes a column-resize operation.
    Callback<TableView.ResizeFeatures,​Boolean> TableView.getColumnResizePolicy()
    Gets the value of the property columnResizePolicy.
    Method parameters in javafx.scene.control with type arguments of type TableView.ResizeFeatures
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void TableView.setColumnResizePolicy​(Callback<TableView.ResizeFeatures,​Boolean> callback)
    Sets the value of the property columnResizePolicy.
